title: Property Law and Management
headline: This free online course is a comprehensive guide to UK property management, taxation and property laws.
description: This course will teach you about property rights, ownership, agreements, taxation and management. It explains terms like ‘leases’ and ‘bailments’ in conjunction with value-added tax, capital gains tax, mortgage and property insurance. The detailed property law and taxation modules and the property management process will benefit lawyers, accountants or those wishing to pursue property management as a career.
courseDescription:
Property ownership entails good management and adhering to local laws and regulations. This comprehensive property law and management guide will teach you the fundamentals of managing a property. What are property rights? What is the basic law of property? The first module of this course will answer these questions as you learn about ownership, co-ownership, registered and unregistered land and the property owner's rights and responsibilities.

Next, you will explore property licence laws as you learn about mortgages, property insurance and security interests in property. What are the types of security interests? What kind of taxation applies to properties? You will learn how to help your clients with their tax issues. As the course progresses, it highlights the different security interests in property, details of capital gains tax and the tax relief provisions. Finally, we will introduce you to property management as a profession.

There are provisions in the law that enforce specific requirements and obligations for real estate professionals. Research the roles and responsibilities of property managers, letting agents and property management companies. Property management is a lucrative career option for those who have a knack for numbers and maintaining positive relationships. It does not demand high academic qualifications and completing this course will build your confidence to enter this field. So go ahead and enrol in this free online course today.
